H0.text: Zinc is the resource produced in greater quantities by Nevada mines than by any other state.

H1.text: Copper is the resource produced in greater quantities from Nevada mines than from any other state.

H2.text: Gold is the resource produced from Nevada mines, which produce greater quantities of it than any other state.

H3.text: Lead is the resource produced in greater quantities by Nevada mines than by any other state.

A4.text: Gold mining in Nevada, a state of the United States, is a major industry, and one of the largest sources of gold in the world.

A5.text: In 2018 Nevada produced 5,581,160 troy ounces (173.6 tonnes), representing 78% of US gold and 5.0% of the world's production.
